articles.title: Fed chair warns US inflation battle not over and hints at further rate rises - The Guardian
articles.description: Jay Powell tells symposium in Wyoming that inflation is still too high but that US central bank will ‘keep at it until the job is done’
articles.content:
The Federal Reserve chair, Jerome Powell, used a closely watched speech on Friday to warn that the fight against inflation in the US is not over.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Dutch brewer Heineken completes its withdrawal from Russia, takes $325m hit - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The world’s second largest brewer sold its business in Russia for just 1 euro ($1.08), months after announcing its exit.
articles.content:
Dutch brewer Heineken has completed its withdrawal from Russia, 18 months after Moscow launched its full-scale invasion of Ukraine, selling its business in Russia for just 1 euro ($1.08).
